QuestData.Title: The Final Code
QuestData.Description: They're building a second mana bomb in the courtyard. My intel suggests that the final code for the bomb is being held by Sharth Voldoun, the overseer of the project at Firewing Point.$B$B$n, you have to go back in there and retrieve the final code from him. He keeps himself to the top of the highest spire.$B$BTake the final code to the mana bomb that they're working on in the central courtyard and set it off.$B$BOnly then will we be certain that Stonebreaker Hold is safe.
QuestData.LogDescription: Sergeant Chawni wants you to use the Final Code Sheet to set off the Mana Bomb. Then report back to Tooki at Stonebreaker Hold in Terokkar Forest.
QuestData.CompletionText: Sergeant Chawni has been keeping us apprised of the situation at Firewing Point. Is everything okay?
QuestData.RewardText: YOU DID IT! YOU SAVED US! YOU SAVED STONEBREAKER HOLD!!$B$BWith their forces decimated, their leader dead and the mana bomb destroyed, we can all breathe much easier now.$B$B$N, I've never seen such selflessness... such heroism! Please, accept this on behalf of all of us.
